defs: a dance performed by a number of performers on a stage simultaneously; a group dance.
a wicked, deceitful or fraudulent policy, plan or course of action.
(masc.) an expert in evolving deceitful or fraudulent policies, plans or courses of actions.
(fem.) an expert in evolving deceitful or fraudulent policies, plans or courses of actions.
a written letter or communication that is forged, counterfeit or false.
a verse that is ambiguous or has double meanings.
an ailment of the liver.
a bilious fever of elephants.

a man waging a secret, artful war, in an unfair manner.

the Supreme Being.

the Supreme who is the witness for all the becomings in a person's life.
a place where two or more roads meet or intersect.
the place toward which someone is going or sent; the destination.
a tool for pounding, driving nails, usu. consisting of a metal head fastened across one end of a handle; a hammer.

a convention carried on by tradition by, and enforced within, a clan.

a joining together or being joined together; union; association.

ಕೂಡಬೀಳು kūḍa bīḷu to become accumulated; ಕೂಡಹಾಕು kūḍa hāku = ಕೂಡಿಹಾಕು. ಕೂಡಿಕೊಡು kūḍi koḍu to collect and supply (soldiers, resources, etc.) ಕೂಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳು kūḍikoḷḷu to allow another to be associated with; to admit; 2. to join (oneself) with; ಕೂಡಿಬರು kūḍi baru to happen, befall or occur favourably (as by chance or caused by destiny); 2. to come or join together; 3. to agree; to correspond; to conform; ಕೂಡಿಹಾಕು kūḍi hāku to accumulate; to save from spending;
to rest on the buttocks or haunches (as in a chair or on a mat, floor, etc.); to sit.

the act or fact of sitting; a sitting.

a powdered substance made of burned lime and clay, mixed with water and sand to make mortar or with water, sand, and gravel to make concrete; cement; mortar.

the sign (-) used to join words semantically or syntactically (as in pick-me-up, rock-forming, in English) or to indicate the division of a word at the end of a line.

a man who shares interests and activities in common with others; a partner; an associate.

a short piece of a document, receipt, etc. joined to the original (of which this is a copy), having perforations in between, kept by the issuer as a record of the transaction; a counterfoil.
stock or capital held in a common fund; joint-stock.

a small piece let in between the two, for joining two pieces of stone or timber, contrived to prevent their sliding on one another; a joggle.
a small (usu. rectangular) wooden plank used to sit on.
mutual conversation.
a metal pin or shaft at the end of an axle, to prevent the wheel turning thereon, from going off.

any of a large and widely distributed terrestrial or aquatic reptiles of Testudines order, having a toothless beak and a soft body encased in a tough shell into which the head, tail, and four legs may be withdrawn; a turtle; a tortoise.

in yogic exercise, a particular posture in which the body is shaped in the form of a tortoise.
a female tortoise of Testudines order.
a stiff, fine-pointed, straight woody projection on the stem or other part of a plant; a sharp thorn.

love - a) strong affection for another arising out of kinship or personal ties; b) attraction based on sexual desire; c) affection based on admiration, benevolence or common interests (as love for one's old schoolmates).
the relationship, feelings etc. between friends.
to lose or be deprived of, another's love or affection.
the mythological tortoise, considered as the king of tortoises, that is supposed to uphold the world.
intense affection; deep love.
a sharp edge or blade; a pointed end.
a very strong, formidable army.
a sword with a very sharp blade.
harsh, scorching sunlight.
a piece of land completely surrounded by water; an island.
= ಕೂರ್ಸರಳು.
an instance of incessant shots of sharp arrows; a shower of sharp arrows.
a sharp arrow.
long; esp., too long; lengthy.
a projection at the bottom (as of an idol) made to fit into a corresponding cavity in the base to fix it (as the idol) firmly.
the last point or portion; an end.
collection of objects or material piled up so as to form a high; a pile; a heap.
the sloping margin of a river, stream, etc.; ground at the side of a river; a bank.
rubbing or eroding the bank (as a river, stream, etc.).
done or proceeding through to the end; omitting nothing; complete; thorough.
a river (that which erodes its banks).
the rising ground bordering a river; a bank.
a mound, pile or ridge raised above the surrounding level.
a nest built by ants or termites in the form of a mound; an ant-hill; ant heap.
the region or district by the side of a river.
to shrink suddenly together; break down; to collapse.
a river (that is bound by banks on either side).
the bed of a river (which is in between two banks).
a payment made daily or weekly, by an employer to an employee (esp. an unskilled or manual worker), in return for work or service rendered.
wages, salary or other recompense earned by working; earnings.
a payment for the use or possession of a property.
a hired labourer or burden carrier; a coolie.

ಕೂಲಿ ಕಂಬಳ kūli kambaḷa = ಕೂಲಿ1 - 1; ಕೂಲಿ ಕುಂಬಳಿ kūli kumbaḷi = ಕೂಲಿ1 - 1; ಕೂಲಿ ಕುಪ್ಪಟೆ kūli kuppaṭe = ಕೂಲಿ1 - 1; ಕೂಲಿನಾಲಿ kūli nāli = ಕೂಲಿ1 - 1; ಕೂಲಿಮಾಡು kūli māḍu to work (esp. engage in a hard work) as a coolie on daily or weekly wages.
the tree Gmelina arborea ( = Premna arborea) of Verbenaceae family.
= ಕೂಲಿಕಾರ್ತಿ.
an unskilled man hired for labour on daily or weekly wages; a labourer; a coolie.
